romalrc.lyric:
[00:00.300]
[00:24.640]ying yin yi zoi sa min yei
[00:27.690]mong tin bin sing sao
[00:30.490]ying yin teng gin siu tei kam
[00:33.390]yv ya ci sou zoi tiu dao
[00:36.390]wei ho zi sing ya wan yv
[00:39.390]lao zoi o di tin hong
[00:43.190]zei man yi hao yam sun ga zv
[00:48.440]yen yv tin soeng di ming yv
[00:51.880]si ba ho yong yao
[00:54.330]cing yv ku guo zi wei lao
[00:57.330]mou ho wan gao zoi fan bi
[01:00.420]wei ho zi si sa mong
[01:03.380]tin ma o di hong hui
[01:07.230]zei man yei mu yao man bi
[01:12.370]ying zoi sv wing gao
[01:15.620]soeng ba dou si zei hao
[01:18.570]cong mei yi wui yiu fan sao
[01:27.320]dan o di sam mui fan mui ha
[01:30.230]ying yin bei ta zim yao
[01:34.530]ta ci zei yv yi
[01:36.280]ying yin si ba hoi hao
[01:39.330]tei kam du zao du zao zoe
[01:42.380]ming yv bun yi sam cao
[01:46.000]o di hin gua
[01:47.400]o di hao mong
[01:48.600]zi zi yi hao
